mapper.select: select count(*) from PR02 where PRNO = #{prno} and REVISION = #{revision}
SELECT seqno FROM(SELECT * FROM pr02 WHERE prno=#{prno} AND revision=#{revision}) t ORDER BY seqno DESC LIMIT 1
